summary: A pack of bat files to create a build in seconds
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static-6.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/65163-1-1430071785.png[/img]

First of all, engish isn't my mother languaje so i apologize for the mistakes


[img]http://i58.servimg.com/u/f58/11/28/30/39/descri10.png[/img]
This mod adds arround 63 Bat files for different purposes



5 Overhaul Bats
-ALLDragonWords: Teach you all the dragon words and also adds 60 Dragon Souls
-ALLSkills100: Makes you lvl 82 and all the skills at rank 100
-ALLSpells: Gives you all the spells without the "psbcrap"
-RemoveAllSpells: Removes all the spells that the previous one gives
-ResetCharacter: Reset your character in skills and level



Skill Bats:
About this ones i made them because i get tired of "incpcs" the skills. The incpcs command increase the players skill points by one point (EX: Type "IncPCS Destruction" gives you 1 point in Destruction) also level's you and give's the appropiate perks, it is perfect for situations like "i get tired of leveling lockpick i'll give me just a few points", and also gives you a leveled cheating.
So the main goal of this is just bring you perks, level and skills like if you was training all the time
The Bat files has this structure:
NameOfTheSkill100: increase the players skill points by 100.
NameOfTheSkill50: increase the players skill points by 50.

Ex:
bat illusion100
bat restoration50
bat twohanded100



Spell Bats:
-MgicSchoolSpells: add all the "MagicSchool" spells. Replace MagicSchool for a School of magic.
Ex:
bat DestructionSpells
bat AlterationSpells



"Become a" bats:
I made some classes in the bats for those who are lazy or wanna try one of this classes. I made some of them by myself and others taking ideas form this page ( http://theskyrimblog.ning.com/ ) i must say that most of those builds are awesome and indeed i recomend you to check them.
All the builds gives you items and enchantments from Vanilla and level your character in their respective main and secondary skills

-BecomeAArcaneArcher: Based on this build http://theskyrimblog.ning.com/group/character-building/forum/topics/character-build-the-arcane-archer
-BecomeABlade: It adds you the Blades sword and a complete enchanted Akaviri set
-BecomeABronzeSentiel: Based on this build http://theskyrimblog.ning.com/group/character-building/forum/topics/character-build-bronze-sentinel
-BecomeADaedraWarrior: It gives you a complete enchanted daedric set, also all of the daedric weapons enchanted with some interesting things. Also gives all the destruction spells
-BecomeADragonTank: it gives you a really OP Dragon Set
-BecomeAFalmerPaladin: it adds a Falmer Bow (Poison damage + elf slayer) and a Honed Falmer Sword (poison damage + elf slayer) and a complete enchanted falmer armor set
-BecomeAGreyBeard: it fit's you out with the greybeard robes and also adds all the dragon words and 60 dragonsouls
-BecomeAMonk: Based on http://theskyrimblog.ning.com/group/character-building/forum/topics/character-build-master-monk
-BecomeAMoragtong: Based on http://theskyrimblog.ning.com/group/character-building/forum/topics/character-build-the-morag-tong
-BecomeAnAlikR: Based on http://theskyrimblog.ning.com/group/character-building/forum/topics/character-build-the-alik-r
-BecomeAnAncientWarrior: a complete enchanted set of the ancient armor and also an ancient greatsword and a bow
-BecomeANecroMancer: All destruction, conjuration and alteration spells and a powerfull necromancer robes set to bring destruction to the world
-BecomeANemesis: based on http://theskyrimblog.ning.com/group/character-building/forum/topics/character-build-the-nemesis
-BecomeANightingale: just the most powefull Nightingale set
-BecomeAPsiijic: a complete enchanted set of the psiijic and all spells from all schools (dammit you're a powerfull mage)
-BecomeASentiel: Based on http://theskyrimblog.ning.com/group/character-building/forum/topics/character-build-the-obsidian-sentinel
-BecomeASorcerer: Based on http://theskyrimblog.ning.com/group/character-building/forum/topics/character-build-the-sorcerer





[img]http://i58.servimg.com/u/f58/11/28/30/39/how_us10.png[/img]

Use it is easy:

1- Open the console
2- Type "bat"+SPACE+"NameOfTheBat"
EX: [img]http://i58.servimg.com/u/f58/11/28/30/39/batyou10.jpg[/img]
bat destruction100
bat BecomeAPsiijic
bat resetcharacter
bat removeallspells
3- Press ENTER



[img]http://i58.servimg.com/u/f58/11/28/30/39/instal10.png[/img]

Installation must be easy, even if is a manual installation, just decomprime the rar in the main folder of skyrim, NOT IN DATA!!, in the main folder.


I hope you like it.
Endorse and follow us on tumblr!:
http://systemofgaming.tumblr.com/
author: KataPUMB
